    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board​(CluedoGame cluedoGame)
        Game.Board: The constructor for Game.Board. - Creates a new 2d array and populates with Cells - Initialises ImageIcons for Cells - Generates sprites and places at corresponding starting positions. - Generates Weapons and randomly allocates them to Rooms.
        Parameters:
        cluedoGame - game

    • Method Detail

        public void render()
        Renders all cells, and the dice.

        public void scaleIcons​(int cellSize)
        Scales all images in memory to new size. - NOTE: Does not load new files
        Parameters:
        cellSize - new size of cells.

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell​(java.lang.String cord)
        getCell: Return the Game.Cell stored at the given row/col. Throws InvalidParameterException.
        Parameters:
        cord - String of coordinate. Ie, H13
        Returns:
        Game.Cell at cord.
